page.title: 06The Three Rivers Club.
page.content: The Three Rivers country club has 120 acres and at the moment has up to 2300 members. There are 20 staff that work full time .The membership card costs the family Â£50. The club was built in 1973 and before that year most of the land on which the club now stands was used as farmland. The busiest days of the week are usually Fridays and Saturdays. The THREE RIVERS has tennis ,golf ,swimming ,squash & snooker as their sports and are hoping to get bowling ,a gym, badminton and indoor bowls .On 1 of the golf hills you can see three rivers which are the {CROUCH},the CHELMAR and the{BLACKWATER}.Thats how the THREE RIVERS got its name.
